EmailTemplate.subject: Forrester Analyst Report: Hybrid Cloud Demands Consistency
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The pace of business quickens every year. Is your company keeping pace? We invite you to read the newly published Forrester study to learn more: Hybrid Cloud Demands Consistency <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/hybrid-cloud-demands-consistency-forrester?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ar-forrester-hybrid-cloud-q218]]>.
Cloud platform providers continue to innovate at breakneck speeds as companies eagerly seek out new innovations to create differentiating software products — both in the data center and in public cloud. According to Forrester, 77% of firms use hybrid cloud, which leads to better IT infrastructure efficiency, greater flexibility to meet changing requirements, and faster software delivery cadence.
Read this complimentary report and discover how companies are optimizing their hybrid cloud platforms through solid management and consistency.
[Download Today <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/hybrid-cloud-demands-consistency-forrester?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=ar-forrester-hybrid-cloud-q218]]>]
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
